product_name: Merrell Mira Micro Crossbody Shoulder Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When all you really need to carry is your wallet, phone and small hair brush, the Merrell Mira Micro Crossbody Shoulder Bag fills the bill. Tuck it in your daypack for a post-hike cafe stop. 100% cotton-canvas bag features a durable water repellent finish to resist stays and bead up moisture so it rolls off. Fixed soft webbing shoulder strap lets you sling the bag across the chest for hands-free wearing. Front stash pocket has a weather-resistant zipper. Internal organizational sleeve on the nylon lining keeps small items in place. Custom zipper pulls have leather accents. Closeout.
short_description: When all you really need to carry is your wallet, phone and small hair brush, the Merrell Mira Micro Crossbody Shoulder Bag fills the bill. Tuck it in your daypack for a post-hike cafe stop.
